ocrText:
Basic Steps of Backstitch:  
1. Secure the starting stitch.  
2. Insert the needle one stitch length backward.  
3. Bring the needle out two stitch lengths forward.  
4. Repeat to form a continuous line of stitches.  
Note: Keep the stitch length even.

ocrText:
Key Points for Tomato Sowing:  
1. Choose a sunny plot and deeply turn the soil.  
2. Apply sufficient base fertilizer (organic fertilizer).  
3. Sow seeds at a depth of about 1–2 cm and cover with a thin layer of soil.  
4. Keep the soil moist.  
Jinghai District Community Agricultural Technology Training  
March 2025

ocrText:
Word Problem: Xiao Ming has 15 apples. He gave 3 to Xiao Hong and then bought 5 more. How many apples does Xiao Ming have now?  
15 - 3 + 5 = 17 (apples)  
Answer: Xiao Ming now has 17 apples.

ocrText:
Tianjin Cuisine Online Course Lesson 2: Stir-Fried Shrimp  
Selection: Fresh shrimp, preferably live.  
Preparation: Remove heads, peel shells, and devein.  
Coating: Egg white, starch, salt, cooking wine.  
Stir-frying: Heat oil to medium temperature, quickly stir-fry to separate.  
Sauce: Salt, sugar, cooking wine, water starch.

imageTag:
Please translate the following Chinese text into English, maintaining the original format and meaning:

Health Poster
ocrText:
Rehabilitation Guidance for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease  
Pursed-Lip Breathing: 1. Inhale slowly through the nose; 2. Purse the lips as if whistling; 3. Exhale slowly, with an inhalation-to-exhalation time ratio of 1:2 or 1:3.  
Diaphragmatic Breathing: 1. Relax the shoulders; 2. Place one hand on the chest and the other on the abdomen; 3. Inhale through the nose, allowing the abdomen to expand; 4. Exhale through the mouth, allowing the abdomen to contract.  
It is recommended to practice 2–3 times daily, for 10–15 minutes each session.  
Promoted by the Department of Respiratory Medicine, Jinghai District Hospital
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan took a photo of a hospital health guidance poster, which mainly featured the "Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Rehabilitation Guidance" poster near the water boiling room in the Jinghai District Hospital. It detailed the methods of pursed-lip breathing and diaphragmatic breathing.

ocrText:
Name: Ma Zhiqiang  
Physical Examination Number: TJ20250726001  
Examination Date: 2025-07-25  
Conclusions and Recommendations:  
1. Abdominal ultrasound indicates mild fatty liver. It is recommended to adopt a low-fat and light diet, control body weight, and engage in moderate exercise.  
2. Anteroposterior and lateral lumbar spine X-ray suggests straightening of the physiological curvature of the lumbar spine, possibly indicating lumbar strain. It is recommended to avoid prolonged sitting, strengthen the back muscles through exercise, and consider using supportive braces if necessary.

ocrText: Boarding Suggestions (by Wang Guilan): 1. Bedding: Quilt, mattress, pillow, bed sheets and quilt covers (at least two sets for change). 2. Toiletries: Basin, bucket, towel, toothbrush, toothpaste, shower gel, shampoo. 3. Clothing: Underwear, socks (prepare more), outerwear, pajamas. 4. Other: Common medicines (for colds, stomach issues), clothes hangers, water cup, slippers, small lock. 5. School supplies: Desk lamp, stationery. 6. Suggestion: Contact the school first to clarify, as some items may be uniformly provided.
